records.title: Set up project structure
records.description: Create the base project layout and ensure all core modules load correctly.

records.title: Review routing
records.description: Confirm routes, placeholders, and navigation lifecycle behaviour.

records.title: Build example views
records.description: Add realistic pages to the example app to create interaction pressure.

records.title: Evaluate interaction layer
records.description: Assess whether interaction, gesture, and animation modules are justified.

records.title: Document findings
records.description: Write down what feels webby vs native once the UI is in place.

records.title: Performance profiling
records.description: Measure frame rate during swipe gestures and list scroll.

records.title: Accessibility audits
records.description: Ensure touch targets, focus management, and screen reader labels are correct.
